setup_apple: Setup Apple Mac and iPhone for speech
app_overview_steps: Browse documents in the Library section
Click on any document to open it
Click on sentences or words to hear them spoken
Use the media player to control playback (play, pause, stop)
Adjust settings for language, speed, and voice preferences
Take quizzes to test your knowledge of words and sentences
android_steps: Search for "Text-to-speech" in your device Settings.
Ensure "Google Speech Services" is the preferred engine.
Tap the gear icon to install Thai (Thailand) voice data.
apple_steps: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Spoken Content.
Download an enhanced voice (like "Kanya" or "Siri") for better quality.
